scripts.compile:css: if [ ! -d build ]; then mkdir build; fi && node-sass --output-style=expanded --source-map-embed src/scss/main.scss src/css/main.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && if [ ! -d build ]; then mkdir build; fi && npm run build:css && (npm run build:js & npm run build:html & npm run build:loaders & npm run build:assets)
scripts.compile: if [ ! -d build ]; then mkdir build; fi && npm run compile:css & npm run compile:sassdoc
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:sassdoc & npm run watch:jsdoc
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run open:sassdoc && npm run open:jsdoc && (npm run watch & npm run serve)
